MGnify-BiATA-2021¶

These are the materials that will be used for the “Analysing metagenomic assemblies using MGnify” workshop, carried out as part of the BiATA (Bioinformatics: from Algorithms to Applications) 2021 conference.

  • Assembling data
    • Prerequisites
    • Part 1 - Quality control and filtering of the raw sequence files
    • Part 2 - Assembly and Co-assembly
  • Assembly analysis
    • MGnify hands-on exercises
  • Viral detection and classification
    • 1. Identification of putative viral sequences
    • 2. Detection of viral taxonomic markers
    • 3. Viral taxonomic assignment
  • MAG generation
    • Prerequisites
    • Generating metagenome assembled genomes
